General.Name: Trade-Van Information Services Co
General.Description: Trade-Van Information Services Co. provides cloud value-added services in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers electronic data exchanging and related services; database buildup and related consulting services; and data message design services, as well as computer software and hardware agency services. It also provides custom clearance, cross-border electronic transaction, online land administration, electronic tax filing, automobile liability insurance, asset management, financial monitoring, government systems integration, e-commerce, information security, global logistics and supply chain, e-marketplace platform, trade2cash, and big data services. In addition, the company is involved in the development of information and internet technology; wholesaling of electronic products and daily miscellaneous goods; and provision of import, export, and agency services. Trade-Van Information Services Co. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
